artist: Author: Elijah Coleman Bridgman; Collaborator: Guiding marks by Mitsukuri Genpo; Publisher: Yorozuya Heishirō; Carver: Takeguchi Rōsaburō
catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 496
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: columns of text with a few small maps of different regions of the United States; two small images of Native Americans near back; yellow, textured cover
markings: red Japanese inscription R side of front cover; pencil marks URC inside front cover; pencil marks ULQ of inside back cover; pencil markings ULC front cover; seal near LLC of inside back cover
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Brief Account of the United States (Renpō shiryaku 聯邦志略)
title: Brief Account of the United States, vol. 2
